org.openimaj.io

Class HttpUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.io.HttpUtils

  • public class HttpUtils
extends Object
    HTTP(S) download utilities, with support for HTTP redirects and meta refresh redirection.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HttpUtils.MetaRefreshRedirectStrategy
      A RedirectStrategy that can deal with meta-refresh style redirection

    • Field Summary

      The default user-agent string

    • Method Detail

      • readURLAsBytes

        public static byte[] readURLAsBytes(URL u)
                             throws IOException
        Read the contents of the given URL as an array of bytes. Redirects are followed automatically.
        Parameters:
        u - the URL to read from
        Returns:
        the content referenced by the URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if the URL is not an HTTP(s) URL

      • readURLAsBytes

        public static byte[] readURLAsBytes(URL u,
                                    boolean followRedirects)
                             throws IOException
        Read the contents of the given URL as an array of bytes. If redirects are not being followed, then the result will be null if the URL is redirected.
        Parameters:
        u - the URL to read from
        followRedirects - should redirects be followed?
        Returns:
        the content referenced by the URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if the URL is not an HTTP(s) URL

      • readURLAsByteArrayInputStream

        public static IndependentPair<org.apache.http.HttpEntity,ByteArrayInputStream> readURLAsByteArrayInputStream(URL u,
                                                                                                             boolean followRedirects)
                                                                                                      throws IOException
        Read the contents of the given URL as a ByteArrayInputStream (i.e. a byte[] in memory wrapped in an InputStream). If redirects are not being followed, then the result will be null if the URL is redirected.
        Parameters:
        u - the URL to read from
        followRedirects - should redirects be followed?
        Returns:
        the content referenced by the URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if the URL is not an HTTP(s) URL

      • readURLAsByteArrayInputStream

        public static IndependentPair<org.apache.http.HttpEntity,ByteArrayInputStream> readURLAsByteArrayInputStream(URL u,
                                                                                                             org.apache.http.client.RedirectStrategy strategy)
                                                                                                      throws IOException
        Read the contents of the given URL as a ByteArrayInputStream (i.e. a byte[] in memory wrapped in an InputStream). If redirects are not being followed, then the result will be null if the URL is redirected.
        Parameters:
        u - the URL to read from
        strategy - how redirects should be followed
        Returns:
        the content referenced by the URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if the URL is not an HTTP(s) URL

      • readURLAsByteArrayInputStream

        public static IndependentPair<org.apache.http.HttpEntity,ByteArrayInputStream> readURLAsByteArrayInputStream(URL url,
                                                                                                             int connectionTimeout,
                                                                                                             int readTimeout,
                                                                                                             org.apache.http.client.RedirectStrategy redirectStrategy,
                                                                                                             String userAgent)
                                                                                                      throws IOException
        Read the contents of the given URL as a ByteArrayInputStream (i.e. a byte[] in memory wrapped in an InputStream). If redirects are not being followed, then the result will be null if the URL is redirected.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to read from
        connectionTimeout - amount of time to wait for connection
        readTimeout - amount of time to wait for reading
        redirectStrategy - the redirection strategy
        userAgent - the useragent string
        Returns:
        the content referenced by the URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if the URL is not an HTTP(s) URL

      • readURL

        public static InputStream readURL(URL url)
                           throws IOException
        Open an HttpURLConnection to the URL as an array of bytes. Redirects are followed automatically.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to read from
        Returns:
        the content referenced by the URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if the URL is not an HTTP(s) URL

                                                                 Q reader)

        Q - Type of the object reader.
